Home.lynadLearn_is_learning: LynadLearn is a language learning platform that helps you learn easier, faster and smarter.
Home.join_thousands: Join thousands of users on LynadLearn
Home.how_can_AI_help: How can AI help with learning a new language?
Home.by_processing_the_structure: By processing the structure of a sentence and how words relate to each other, AI can also help learners in understanding how grammatical structures work. LynadLearn is a highly intelligent language teacher always at hand and ready to help.
Home.install_app: Install the LynadLearn application on your mobile and learn the language you want.

Pricing.take_the_next_step: Take the next step to achieve your goals
Pricing.lynadLearn_basic_membership_offers: LynadLearn's Basic membership offers essential language learning tools, while our Premium membership unlocks a treasure trove of advanced features and personalized learning experiences.

Contact_Us.we_take_our_commitment: We take our commitment to our users seriously. If you need our help with your user account, have questions about how to use the platform or are experiencing technical difficulties, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Contact_Us.we_are_also_proud: We are also proud to work with other similar corporations and investors.

About_us.improve_language_learning: To improve language learning process with the help of AI
About_us.we_believe_modern_learning: We believe modern learning means a user-centric approach with the help of all kinds of contents available on the internet. Our mission is to create an AI based platform to make learning more fun and customized.
About_us.a_substantial_part_of_learning: A substantial part of learning a new language includes a constant search for new content to learn and keeping track of everything that you have learned.
About_us.with_the_help_of_AI: With the help of AI this process can be fully automated, decreasing the time it takes to learn a new language substantially.
About_us.to_put_it_simply: To put it simply, we provide you with what you need to learn for the next step and help you use it in the real world.
About_us.why_is_learning_difficult: Why is learning a new language difficult?
About_us.languages_are_these_huge_chunks: Languages are these huge chunks of content and to learn a new one needs a lot of time and dedication.
About_us.learn_new_language: To learn a new language at an advanced level (at least C1) you need to learn about 10000 new words.
About_us.always_fun_start: It is always fun to start learning but to maintain this process needs strong determination that not everyone has.
About_us.if_only_there: If only there was a way to learn languages faster and easier.
About_us.we_are_team: We are a team of software developers and language experts with years of experience in designing and developing large-scale language learning platforms and products. We came to the realization that AI can help learners in many ways and are determined to change the way languages are taught and learned.

Mobile_app.always_download: Have LynadLearn always at hand by downloading our Android or iOS app
Mobile_app.with_lynadlearn: With LynadLearn app , language learning will never be a challenge again
Mobile_app.language_challenge: With this app, language learning will never be a challenge again, and you will quickly pursue your dream of learning a language.
Mobile_app.vocabulary_lessons: Vocabulary lessons from different books and levels.
Mobile_app.complete_grammar: A complete grammar library written for different levels.
Mobile_app.you_can_study: You can study pronunciation like a here.
Mobile_app.grammar_section: In the Grammar section, you have access to a complete grammar library of the desired language, which is categorized by topic. This library is searchable and you can learn grammar from it through different topics.
Mobile_app.pronunciation_section: The pronunciation feature of LynadLearn app helps users improve their pronunciation skills through native speaker recordings, pronunciation guides, interactive exercises, as well as pronunciation tips and resources.
Mobile_app.vocabulary_section: The vocabulary review feature of LynadLearn app allows users to practice and reinforce their knowledge of words and phrases through various exercises and quizzes.
Mobile_app.flash_card_section: The flashcard feature of LynadLearn app enables users to create and study digital flashcards, helping them memorize and review vocabulary, concepts, or any other information they want to learn.
Mobile_app.quiz_section: The quiz feature of LynadLearn app allows users to test their knowledge and assess their understanding of various topics through interactive quizzes and assessments.
Mobile_app.custom_word_list_section: The custom word list feature of LynadLearn app allows users to create personalized vocabulary lists tailored to their specific needs. Users can add words they want to learn, along with their definitions and example sentences, to create a customized study resource.
Mobile_app.idioms_expressions_section: The Idioms & Expressions list feature of LynadLearn app provides users with a comprehensive collection of idioms and expressions in the English language.
Mobile_app.tests_section: The English proficiency tests feature of LynadLearn app provides users with a platform to take standardized English proficiency tests, such as TOEFL or IELTS, to assess their language skills.
Mobile_app.leitner_system_section: The Leitner system list feature of LynadLearn app is a study tool that helps users effectively learn and retain vocabulary. It utilizes a spaced repetition algorithm where words are organized into different levels based on the user's familiarity with them.
Mobile_app.how_download: How can I download LynadLearn mobile app?
Mobile_app.how_download_answer: You can download LynadLearn mobile app from the App Store or Google Play. The app is compatible with Android and iOS devices.
Mobile_app.can_use_premium: Can I use the same LynadLearn premium account on web and mobile devices (Android, iOS)?
Mobile_app.can_use_premium_answer: Yes, you can. Your LynadLearn premium account is valid for both web and mobile platforms. You just need to log in with the same email on any device you want to use.
Mobile_app.will_data_sync: Will my learning data (Custom wordlists, Daily vocabulary, etc.) be synchronized across web and mobile app?
Mobile_app.will_data_sync_answer: Yes, they will. Your learning data is stored on our cloud server and will be automatically synced across web and mobile app. You can access your custom wordlists, daily vocabulary, progress reports, and more on any device.
Mobile_app.is_difference: Is there any difference in the learning content between the website and the mobile app?
Mobile_app.is_difference_answer: It can be. The content on our website is updated more frequently than the content on our mobile app. This means that some new features and content may not be available on the app right away. We are working hard to make sure that the app is always up to date with the latest content and features.
Mobile_app.is_dictionary: Does the app include LynadLearn dictionary?
Mobile_app.is_dictionary_answer: Yes, it does. The app includes a comprehensive dictionary that covers all the words and phrases you learn with LynadLearn. You can also use the dictionary to look up any word or phrase you encounter in your learning journey. However, please note that the web version of the dictionary may be more up-to-date than the app version.
Mobile_app.no_platform: There is no platform like LynadLearn
Mobile_app.have_lynadlearn: Have LynadLearn always at hand by downloading our Android or iOS app

lists.lets_start: Lets start your journey to learn categorized English vocabulary on LynadLearn.
lists.cefr_wordlist_detail: Here you will find different wordlists categorized by level according to CEFR.

vocabulary.word_maxLength: Word must be less than 30 characters
vocabulary.definition_maxLength: Definition must be less than 70 characters
vocabulary.translation_maxLength: Translation must be less than 70 characters
vocabulary.pronunciation_maxLength: Pronunciation must be less than 30 characters
vocabulary.example_maxLength: Example must be less than 150 characters
